definition: component in Chinese characters, occurring in 青, 毒, 素 etc/see also 青字頭|青字头[qing1 zi4 tou2]
to kick a drug habit/to abstain from drugs
poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)

sentences.english: The rooting medium should be moist, well aerated, and sterile .
sentences.chinese: 生根的基质应当是湿润，透气良好和消过毒的。

sentences.english: Objective To study the subchronic toxicity of the oxidized hair dyes in mice.
sentences.chinese: 研究氧化型染发剂经皮染毒对小鼠的亚慢性毒作用。

sentences.english: Let the sleeping death seep through.
sentences.chinese: 苹果醮毒，让死之沉睡渗入。

sentences.english: This makes it easier to get viral and bacterial infections.
sentences.chinese: 肌体更容易感染滤过性病毒和细菌病毒。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of hemoperfusion in the critically-type neurotoxie poisonous snake bites.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨血液灌流法对重危型神经毒毒蛇咬伤的疗效。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the cheat who advertises lamb but sells dog meat poisons his customers.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，挂羊头卖狗肉，毒也。

sentences.english: Snow White ate the bad apple.
This paper deals with a summary of the diet and the agricultural importance of paederus.
sentences.chinese: 本文综述了毒隐翅虫的食性及其在农业上的重要性。

sentences.english: These things can hunt in the trees as well as on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 这让毒狼不仅能在地面上狩猎还能在树上进退自如。

sentences.english: AIM: To study the anti angiogenesis effects of the active fraction separated from Naja Atra venom.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究中华眼镜蛇毒活性组分的抗血管生成作用。

sentences.english: HE pricked tHE blister on his HEel with a sterilized needle.
sentences.chinese: 他用一根消过毒的针扎破脚后跟上的水泡。

sentences.english: Roy:Crap, I think those shuriken were poisoned.
sentences.chinese: 该死，我猜这些镖涂了毒。

sentences.english: In all these procedures, sterile needles and instruments are used.
sentences.chinese: 在这些过程中，使用的针头和医疗器械都是消过毒的。

sentences.english: The supply of cheap drugs and glue - sniffing a tendency to make the problem worse.
sentences.chinese: 廉价毒品的供应和吸胶毒的倾向使这个问题更加严重。

sentences.english: Experts offer their tips on handling bully and toxic bosses.
sentences.chinese: 专家提供了建议，该如何对付这些恶霸式的毒老板。

sentences.english: Because humans live on land, they don't think of fish as venomous.
sentences.chinese: 因为人类生活在陆地上，所以不觉得鱼会有什么毒。

definition: to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)
to cure ills with poison (TCM)/to fight evil with evil/set a thief to catch a thief/to fight fire with fire
a poison/a toxic agent/poison gas/a chemical weapon
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
arch. legendary venomous insect/to poison/to bewitch/to drive to insanity/to harm by witchcraft/intestinal parasite
